column1: courseCertTemp,,,,,"<!doctype html><html><head><meta name=\"viewport\" content=\"width=device-width\"><meta http-equiv=\"Content-Type\" content=\"text/html
column2: charset=UTF-8\"><title></title></head><body style=\" -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased
column4: padding: 0
column7: \"><link href=\"https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Noto+Sans:400,700&display=swap\" rel=\"stylesheet\"><table border=\"0\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" style=\"font-family:'Noto Sans','Roboto','Google Sans', sans-serif
column38: \"><table border=\"1\" bordercolor=\"#F0E68C\" bgcolor=\"lightyellow\" cellpadding=\"12\" cellspacing=\"0\" style=\"font-family:'Noto Sans','Roboto','Google Sans', sans-serif
column46: \" valign=\"middle\"> #if ($dikshaImgUrl) #end
column72: \">You have successfully completed the training, $TraningName.
column78: \">Your effort is highly appreciated!
column84: \">Note: Refer instructions given below to download your certificate and digitally verify it.
column95: \" bgcolor=\"#F2F2F2\">You can download your course certificates from the DIKSHA portal or DIKSHA mobile app.
column102:
\">

To download your certificates from the DIKSHA portal:
column109:
\">
  • Use your registered User ID to log in to www.diksha.gov.in/explore
  • Click on the Profile icon.
  • Select Profile from the menu.
  • Scroll to the Courses section.
  • The certificate courses that you have completed have a link to download your certificate.
  • Click Download Certificate.
  • A PDF version of your certificate is downloaded on your laptop/desktop.
column116: \">To download your certificates from the DIKSHA mobile app:
column123:
\">
  • Click on the Profile icon from the menu bar at the bottom of your screen.
  • Scroll to the Courses section.
  • The certificate courses that you have completed have a link to download your certificate.
  • Click Download Certificate.
  • Click on Downloads icon from the menu bar at the bottom of your screen.
  • The certificate is available as a pdf file in your downloads folder..
    • Note: If you are unable to download your certificates using the mobile app, go to Google Play > DIKSHA app. Click Update, to upgrade to the latest app version.
column129: \">To digitally verify your certificate:
column137:
\">
  • Open your downloaded certificate.
  • Scan the QR code on your certificate, or enter the character code below the QR code.
  • Your certificate is verified.
column143: \">To print the certificate in high resolution, select the following specifications:
column151:
\">
  • Open your downloaded certificate.
  • Select Print.
  • Select the following specifications:
    • Paper quality: 300 GSM
    • Paper size: A4
    • Printer type: Colour Laser printer
    "

column30: \">
column40: line-height:1.7\">This is to inform you that your nomination for the project $projectName has been accepted. You can start contributing content for this project. Please ensure that the content you contribute is relevant to the project needs, is as per the Content Policy and is submitted as per the timelines given in the project details.
column44: line-height:1.7\"> If you are a contributing organization, please follow the steps mentioned below to contribute:
column48: line-height:1.7\"> <li> Step 1: Admin has to invite users of your organization to sign in to the system and assign them the role of contributors and reviewers
column49:
Please watch How to invite contributors and reviewers video in this link: $baseUrl/contribute/help
  • Step 2: Users with the contributor role will have to upload content
column50:
Please watch How to contribute content as a contributor of an organization video in this link: $baseUrl/contribute/help
  • Step 3: Users with the reviewer role will have to perform the internal review before the content can be sent for the final review to the sourcing organization
column51: Please watch How to review content as a reviewer of an organization video in this link: $baseUrl/contribute/help
column55: line-height:1.7\">Contributing organizations are requested to share the above videos with their contributors and reviewers.
column59: line-height:1.7\"> If you are an individual contributor, please watch How to contribute content as a individual contribute video in this link: $baseUrl/contribute/help
column63: line-height:1.7\"> All your content will undergo review and will be accepted or rejected based on its relevance and quality. The final decision lies with the project owner.
column75:
line-height:1.7\">Note: This is an automatically generated email. Replies to this mailbox will not be monitored. If you are not the intended recipient of this message, or need to communicate with the team, write to vdnsupport@teamdiksha.org

"
